cello.alt.servlet.js
Interface ModuleProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
GlobalScope
public interface ModuleProvider

Interface defined for objects that can create Module objects from module/script names.

Author:
Marcello

Method Summary
 Module getScriptModule(java.lang.String name)
          Each module has its own scope from which its scripts are executed.
 

Method Detail

getScriptModule

Module getScriptModule(java.lang.String name)
Each module has its own scope from which its scripts are executed. This method returns that scope (creating it if necessary). It also creates the necessary object hierarchy. For example, if this method were called with the argument "module1.module2.Script", a global.module1 would be created, and within that a module2, global.module1.module2.

Parameters:
name - the module/script name (or .*)
Returns:
the scope associated with this module/script name
